title: The Season of Conflict
itunes:author: Guest: Debra Fileta
itunes:summary:
Conflict is part of marriage. But if you're willing to work through it, your relationship can become stronger even after a fight. John talks with Greg and Erin about how they paint a realistic picture of marital conflict when counseling an engaged couple. Featuring Mrs. Debra Fileta.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Get Debra Fileta's book "Love in Every Season: Understanding the Four Stages of Every Healthy Relationship" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-10-26?refcd=1289601

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/the-season-of-conflict/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
